channel.title: Dragon claws help plz!
channel.description: Ok, I was just wondering if anyone knew how to make the Dragon Claws special attack never hit 0. I have the 4 hit special attack working but almost all the time, out of the 4 hits, I hit 3 zero's and only 1 actual damage hit...If someone knows how to fix this or what ever, please PM me because I will probably forget to check this again lmao but plz post here too just in case. THANK YOU EVERYONE!!
